comment: Stop reporting that the aircraft was flying at kts. The aircraft hit the mountain at KTS (435 MPH).
amr:
# ::snt Stop reporting that the aircraft was flying at kts. The aircraft hit the mountain at KTS (435 MPH).
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / stop-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (r / report-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (f / fly-01
                        :ARG1 (a / aircraft)
                        :path (m2 / mountain
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "KTS")))))
      :snt2 (h / hit-01
            :ARG1 (a2 / aircraft)
            :ARG2 (s2 / speed-quantity
                  :quant435 (m3 / mile-per-hour))
            :location m2))
